                                                       Optional<Description> priorDescOpt,
                                                       String langCode)
        Get the best description for a given language code.
        Parameters:
        item - a described item
        priorDescOpt - if the object is hierarchical, the parent-level description
        langCode - a 3-letter language code.
        Returns:
        the best matching description found

      • iso639DashTwoCode

        public static String iso639DashTwoCode(String nameOrCode)
        Take an ISO-639-1 code or a language name and try and map to a valid ISO639-2 code.
        Parameters:
        nameOrCode - a language code or name to convert
        Returns:
        the ISO 639-2 language code for that code or name, or the input string if no conversion was found

      • iso639DashOneCode

        public static String iso639DashOneCode(String nameOrCode)
        Take an ISO-639-2 code or a language name and try and map to a valid ISO639-1 code.
        Parameters:
        nameOrCode - a language code or name to convert
        Returns:
        the ISO 639-1 language code for that code or name, or the input string if no conversion was found

      • codeToName

        public static String codeToName(String code)
        Convert a 2- or 3-letter language code to its (English) name.

        If no name can be found the input code will be returned.

        Parameters:
        code - a 2- or 3-letter ISO639 code
        Returns:
        a language name, with the original code as a fall back

      • iso3166dashOneCodeToName

        public static String iso3166dashOneCodeToName(String code)
        Convert an ISO 3166-1 country code to its (English) name.
        Parameters:
        code - the 2-letter country code
        Returns:
        the country name, or the code as a fallback

      • countryCodeToName

        public static String countryCodeToName(String code)
        Convert and ISO639-2 code to its (English) name.
        Parameters:
        code - the 2-letter country code
        Returns:
        the country name
